Parameter.name: nl.mpi.archiveName
Parameter.description: Name of the archive as it should appear in web applications

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.smtpHost
Parameter.description: SMTP server for sending e-mails to user and corpman

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.emailAddressCorpman
Parameter.description: email address of user corpman corpman@mpi.nl

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.rrs.allowNewInternalUsers
Parameter.description: REQUIRED - If set to true, RRS will allow users to register without login in first. Setting it to false only makes sense in a federated Shibboleth context.

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.rrs.registrationFile
Parameter.description: REQUIRED - Absolute path to a file for saving pending registrations data (needs read/write access)

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.rrs.archiveUsersIdpName
Parameter.description: Name of IdP to be shown to users that have registered unauthenticated. Leave empty to have none shown (e.g. if there is only one or non-shibboleth mode).

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.rrs.dobesCocLink
Parameter.description: Link to location of file with DoBES Code of Conduct. Set to 'none' for skipping the code of conduct step or 'default' for /ds/RRS_V1/dobes_coc_v2.html

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.rrs.dobesCocLicenseName
Parameter.description: Name of the Dobes code of conduct license as stored in the AMS database

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.rrs.amsInterfaceLink
Parameter.description: URL AMS lat access management system, will be the destination of the link in the 'Thank you' page at the end of the registration process

Parameter.name: nl.mpi.imdibrowserOpenPathPrefix
Parameter.description: Prefix for http link to nodeId e.g.: /corpus1.mpi.nl/ds/imdi_browser?openpath=MPI177915%23
